metadata.title: CVE-2023-2961 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
A segmentation fault flaw was found in the Advancecomp package. This maylead to decreased availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5-1').
